a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHepatitisAIHAV2Logic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis A.Inactivated HAV 2 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis A vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Inactivated hepatitis A virus (HAV), 2-dose schedule * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHepatitisAIHAV2Logic

def.name: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 12 months

def.name: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "One hepatitis A primary series dose was administered"
"The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago"

operand.name: One hepatitis A primary series dose was administered
The latest Hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago

def.name: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1"
"Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2"

operand.name: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1
Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2

def.name: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis A dose as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis A dose as the latest hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis A dose as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis A dose as the latest hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis A dose as client's age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis A dose as the latest hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.

def.name: Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "No hepatitis A primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 12 months"

def.name: Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis A dose as no Hepatitis A doses were administered and client is within the appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis A dose as the latest hepatitis A dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis A dose as no Hepatitis A doses were administered and client is within the appropriate age range. Check for contraindications. '
"Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis A dose as the latest hepatitis A dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications. '

def.name: Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

a:s.a:s: "Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered"

expression.name: Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered

def.name: Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete. Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: 'Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete. Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

expression.value: Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete. Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis A dose as client\'s age is less than 12 months. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis A dose as no Hepatitis A doses were administered and client is within the appropriate age range. Check for contraindications. '
"Client is not due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis A dose as the latest hepatitis A dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is due for Hepatitis A vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis A dose as the latest hepatitis A dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications. '
'Hepatitis A immunization schedule is complete. Two hepatitis A primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
